class_notes: PLEASE NOTE: This class will meet at irregular times, generally evenings and on weekends according to the schedule of the show.
course_description: A required course for all majors and minors. Students undertake a substantial technical theater responsibility in a Theater Emory production (e.g. light or sound operator, costume crew, running props backstage, etc.)
sections: Class Nbr: 1850, Section #: 1, Type: PRA, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: S. Culpepper, Status: Open
